content:
I apologize if my previous response did not accurately address your requirements. Based on your previous message, here's a revised blueprint for the webgem web application:

1. Seller Accounts
* Seller registration and profile management
* Ability to add and manage products
* Product details page with images, description, price, and stock availability
* Ability to view and manage orders received
* Ability to view transaction history and generate reports
1. Order Management
* Buyers can add products to cart and place orders
* Order details page with order summary
